data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 758,611 believers in Shenzhen to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shenzhen, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Shenzhen to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Shenzhen.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Shenzhen.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Han Chinese, Hakka people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Shenzhen who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, let it be said of the 9,241,389 lost in Shenzhen that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the county of Shenzhen, Guangdong, China has a population of 10,000,000.

We estimate Shenzhen has 758,611 people who might know Jesus, 161,549 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,079,840 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
